name: Evolved Digital Systems
overview: Evolved Digital Systems, Inc. operates as a healthcare technology company in the United States and Canada. It transform hospitals, outpatient clinics, and physician offices from film-based to digital systems for image management, hospital information systems integration, regional outreach networks, practice and department management, and patient reporting. The companyâ€™s managed services for digital imaging workflow includes RadWeb, a Web-based radiology information system that manages the image and data flow across traditional radiology processes, such as receptionist, technologist, radiologist/dictation, transcription, and administration; View2, a picture archiving communications system that stores radiology and cardiology images on a centralized Web-based platform, which provides entire medical team with an integrated enterprise-wide archival and storage solution; data verification system for consistency of digital imaging systems, which integrate with virtually various imaging devices that enables the required access to relevant datasets, such as image, text, and audio files associated with a patient study. It also offers disaster recovery; scheduling service that performs tasks from setting up an initial appointment for a patient to gathering various patients benefit and referring physician information; and radiology and cardiology transcription services. In addition, Evolved Digital Systems provides pre-order assessment, project management, workflow consulting, training, system integration and interfacing, and network implementation services. The company, formerly known as Electromed Inc., was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Montreal, Canada.
